name: Sicilian Pizza Crust
author: copetenn
summary: Add a savory Italian flavor to your pizza via this Sicilian crust.
ingredients: 1 cup warm water (95 to 110 degrees F/35 to 43 degrees C)
directions: Combine warm water and yeast in a small bowl; stir until yeast is dissolved
Let stand until yeast forms a creamy foam, about 10 minutes
Pour yeast mixture into a large bowl; add shortening, salt, sugar, and Italian seasoning
Stir in flour by hand until dough comes together
Turn dough out on a floured work surface and knead until smooth, 5 to 8 minutes
Transfer to a large greased bowl
Cover with a moist towel and let rise in a warm place until doubled in size, about 45 minutes
Let stand for 3 to 5 minutes for air to release
Roll into a ball; spread and stretch over the bottom of a pizza pan
Let rise for 15 minutes before topping and baking
